Public NotInheritable Class EventSetterHandlerConverter Inherits TypeConverter
public ref class EventSetterHandlerConverter sealed : System::ComponentModel::TypeConverter

summary.span: Converts the string name of an event setter handler to a delegate representation.

span.span: Converts the string name of an event setter handler to a delegate representation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关如何为 WPF XAML 处理事件处理程序的名称的详细信息，请参阅[XAML 概述 (WPF)](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-overview-wpf.md)。For more information about how XAML for WPF processes event handler names, see [XAML Overview (WPF)](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-overview-wpf.md).
